content: तक्षकः [तक्ष् ण्वुल्] {@--1@} A carpenter, wood-cutter (whether by caste or profession). {@--2@} The chief actor in the prelude of a drama ({%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} the सूत्रधार). {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of the architect of the gods. {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of one of the principal Nāgas or serpents of the Pātāla, son of Kaśyapa and Kadru; (saved at the intercession of the sage Āstīka from being burnt down in the serpent-sacrifice performed by king Janamejaya, in which many others of his race were burnt down to ashes).
